```bash
powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; $root='basis-tracker'; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $root -Force | Out-Null; $dirs=@('frontend/src/app/students/new','frontend/src/app/students/[id]','frontend/src/app','frontend/src/components','frontend/src/lib','frontend/src/hooks','frontend/src/styles','backend/basis_tracker/core','backend/basis_tracker/users','backend/basis_tracker/students/tests','backend/basis_tracker/students','backend/basis_tracker/reports','backend/basis_tracker/media','infra/docker','infra/sql','infra/scripts','docs'); foreach($d in $dirs){ New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path (Join-Path $root $d) -Force | Out-Null }; $files=@('README.md','.gitignore','.env.example','frontend/package.json','frontend/next.config.ts','frontend/tailwind.config.ts','frontend/postcss.config.js','frontend/tsconfig.json','frontend/.env.example','frontend/src/app/layout.tsx','frontend/src/app/page.tsx','frontend/src/app/students/page.tsx','frontend/src/app/students/new/page.tsx','frontend/src/app/students/[id]/page.tsx','frontend/src/app/attendance/page.tsx','frontend/src/app/progress/page.tsx','frontend/src/app/journals/page.tsx','frontend/src/app/reports/page.tsx','frontend/src/components/.gitkeep','frontend/src/lib/.gitkeep','frontend/src/hooks/.gitkeep','frontend/src/styles/globals.css','backend/manage.py','backend/requirements.txt','backend/.env.example','backend/basis_tracker/__init__.py','backend/basis_tracker/settings.py','backend/basis_tracker/urls.py','backend/basis_tracker/wsgi.py','backend/basis_tracker/asgi.py','backend/basis_tracker/core/__init__.py','backend/basis_tracker/core/permissions.py','backend/basis_tracker/core/storage.py','backend/basis_tracker/users/models.py','backend/basis_tracker/users/serializers.py','backend/basis_tracker/users/views.py','backend/basis_tracker/users/urls.py','backend/basis_tracker/users/admin.py','backend/basis_tracker/students/models.py','backend/basis_tracker/students/serializers.py','backend/basis_tracker/students/views.py','backend/basis_tracker/students/urls.py','backend/basis_tracker/students/admin.py','backend/basis_tracker/students/tests/.gitkeep','backend/basis_tracker/reports/services.py','backend/basis_tracker/reports/views.py','backend/basis_tracker/reports/urls.py','infra/docker-compose.dev.yml','infra/docker/Dockerfile.backend','infra/docker/Dockerfile.frontend','infra/sql/.gitkeep','infra/scripts/.gitkeep','docs/api.md','docs/data_model.md','docs/flows.png'); I need to set up a directory structure, but it looks like the commands are failing due to line breaks or splitting. I see that there’s an error related to parsing variables, possibly caused by $dirs getting messed up with brackets. In PowerShell, those brackets should be fine. Since previous attempts didn’t work properly, I’m considering using a simpler command or running multiple commands sequentially. Maybe creating directories with New-Item for each would be better, even if it means more calls.
```

I'm considering using `cmd.exe` with 'mkdir' to create nested directories like `basis-tracker\frontend\src\app\students\new`. I’ll also track my tasks by marking the first as completed after creating the directories and set the second one as in progress. My plan is to run a series of `mkdir` commands followed by file creation. Let's give this a try!</details></think>
